Question: Dongguan Lanxin Rubber Technology Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Lanxin Rubber and Plastic Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: Silicone Rubber Products

- Various solid or liquid silicone rubber parts, such as keypads, watchbands, and sealing gaskets
- Special-shaped foam sponge and EPE, EVA, CR, EPDM, PORON foam products
- Insulating, conductive, and shielding materials including PET, PC, PP, PS, FR, FIBER, NYLON, graphite, thermal pads, and conductive foam/fabric
- Silk screen printing of electronic nameplates on PC, PET, and PMMA panels
- Screws, hardware stamping parts, and various EVA boxes and sewing bags for electronics packaging
- Precise plastic injection parts in PC, ABS, and TPU material
- Authorized agent for 3M industrial tape and HUTCHINSON Bulatex EPDM foam

For more information, visit www.cn-lanxin.com or contact info@cn-lanxin.com.
Summary_cn:
东莞市蓝信橡塑科技有限公司。

产品：硅橡胶制品

- 各种固体或液体硅橡胶制品，如按键、表带和密封垫
- 特殊形状的泡沫海绵和EPE、EVA、CR、EPDM、PORON泡沫制品
- 绝缘、导电和屏蔽材料，包括PET、PC、PP、PS、FR、FIBER、NYLON、石墨、导热垫和导电泡沫/织物
- 在PC、PET和PMMA面板上进行电子名称牌的丝网印刷
- 用于电子包装的螺丝、五金冲压件以及各种EVA盒子和缝纫袋
- PC、ABS和TPU材料的精密塑料注塑件
- 3M工业胶带和HUTCHINSON Bulatex EPDM泡沫的授权代理商

获取更多信息，请访问www.cn-lanxin.com或联系info@cn-lanxin.com。
